metadata.description: ** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER.  ConsultIDs: CVE-2014-9750, CVE-2014-9751.  Reason: this ID was intended for one issue, but was associated with two issues.  Notes: All CVE users should consult CVE-2014-9750 and CVE-2014-9751 to identify the ID or IDs of interest. All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.
